website_summaries.verdict: This classic hanging-style hammock is ideal for cages and crates, but will work on chair legs, too.
pros: Reversible sides provide a cool surface for summer and a cozy cot for winter
Can be hung in a crate or attached to chair legs
Large enough to hold almost any size cat
cons: A handful of owners had issues with the clips breaking after light use

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a sturdy hammock
customer_reviews.text: I received these yesterday and love them. I have bought about every hammock available and most broke within a day! I started using zip ties to keep them hung. These are sturdy and really nice, bigger than most, which is perfect for my cat rescue. I definitely recommend and actually just placed an order for 4 more!
customer_reviews.author: New Beginnings Feral Rescue, Inc

customer_reviews.title: Large and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Update: It has been less than 3 months and 2 of the straps have broken. They broke directly where they attach to the strap. The first broke a week ago and I fixed it with a bungee ball cord and the second broke last night. The kitties are now 13 and 14 pounds. Original: Large enough to fit across our XL kennel turned catio. Clasps appear high quality. Has a waterproof bottom liner, so water can pool if used outside. Pictured with a 10 lb 6 month old Maine Coon.
customer_reviews.author: Avinelle Malone

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy just one if you have multiple cats, they'll fight over it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my cats to hang around in. My normally peaceful cats now fight over who gets the hammock. Worse than my kids! It is slightly larger than I expected. Made with rip-stop material on the outside, warm-fuzzy cloth on the inside. The hanging straps are secure and the hardware is sturdy enough that I don't worry it'll break. I'll be picking up a couple more of these in the near future just to keep the peace in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Grapeful Dead

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today, so I may have to eat my words... This is the best cat hammock I’ve ever seen (and I’ve seen a lot as a cat rescuer and shelter volunteer!) It’s very sturdy and the strap hooks make it really adaptable. One of my cats has kidney disease and needs to be sorted from the others at meal time and at night. So he and his cat friend stay in a big cage overnight. They love their hammock and have gone through several. It’s not only a comfy bed, but a nice toy. Hopefully it will stand up to 25 pounds of playful cat.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has a cool side and a warm ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping - it came overnight on a Saturday! Cats are still checking it out, but they have a window hammock and I think they'll really take to this. I like that it has a cool side and a warm side depending on the season.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cline II

customer_reviews.title: Well made hammock!
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be exceptionally well made. It has two different ways to attach, and the straps are adjustable and extremely sturdy. I have purchased quite a few different brands, which I must repair every couple of months, for our two Savannah cats and one domestic girl. They are all very rough and tumble cats, and manage to destroy everything. This hammock may actually stand up to the rough use. I will update my review in a couple of months. The price was very reasonable, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Arrow2013

customer_reviews.title: Kitten loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and well made. I had to tighten the straps all the way and wrap them around the chair legs a few times to keep the hammock from dragging the floor. Not a big deal though, and at least it will fit a wide range of chair sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Well made but my cats aren't interested
customer_reviews.text: I thought the cats would like it, but they have no interest at all. I was going to return it, but discovered a new use. It worked perfectly as an "end table" when I connected it between two camp chairs. Obviously, it won't hold open drinks, but it's a convenient place to put down sandwiches, snacks, sunglasses etc. So, it works great for humans, but the cats are back to the cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Jackalin

customer_reviews.title: Two kittens love to cuddle together in the hammock
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Bought it last Fall and put it in the kitten's crate. They love it! They started snuggling together in it right away. Now one kitten is 9 months, the other almost 10 months, and the hammock still supports their combined weight AND they still love to be in it at the same time. No signs of damage.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Cats & Kittens love this. I rescue. So they get Washed A lot! And with stand up to many washings.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it, kitties love it. Originally set up in crate for Tucker (kitten) after his toe surgery. Now set up under end table. I ordered more. UPS regular driver was off but other driver found my package that was delivered somewhere else got it back and delivered to me just now. I ordered 3 more. These are better quality than the other ones i ordered from a different vender.
customer_reviews.author: Constance S Klagge

customer_reviews.title: The best yet
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the best one I have bought. My cats wanted to get it in before I could get it all the way put up and want to get on top of each other as well. They have broke so many. This one seems to be the most durable yet! It's a good size and looks to be very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Carter

customer_reviews.title: Smaller cats might like it better
customer_reviews.text: Our cats are pushing 15 lbs, so this hammcok was not a huge hit. Smaller cats might like it better. We also hung them in large cages, which meant they had to hang sort of...crooked. Lastly, the color faded quickly to a weird bluish-green color (they haven't been washed, due to little use). They're in baggies in storage now..... We'll try again next winter.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Have a chunky pet that loves hammocks? Try this!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find this same hammock since I first purchased it last year. I am so glad I found it!! I have purchased many of different brands and am truly lucky my animal (Romeo) hasn’t been injured. Some straps have immediately broke with him barely climbing on it (meeting less than the weight limit.) Out of all the hammocks I’ve bought.. this is one that out performs the rest.. my little guy is laying in it now sound asleep. Which hasn’t happened in quite a while! From now on, I will never buy anything but this hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M.

customer_reviews.title: Mossy's favorite spot.
customer_reviews.text: My chubby, lazy girl has found her spot. She spends a good portion of her time napping in her hammock. She loves it so much, she won't even let her brother up to hang out on it with her.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves this - you need 2.
customer_reviews.text: My incontinent kitty has to be caged at night..... diapers dont work on her (yet). This hammock is vonderful! She loves it. Liked it so much, I bought a 2nd one to rotate cleaning /drying time. Easy to hose off and dry in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it but not made tha well
customer_reviews.text: It was great for about a week then the one corner strap tore off. Apparently it wasn't sewn in very well. The cats that use it aren't large cats so I was a bit disappointed because they really did like it and there was always a cat in it. I'll definitely look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: mauicatwoman

customer_reviews.title: Great item at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to travel across the country with my 4 cats. I had two wire crates and hung one in each to give my cats more space. It was perfect, freed up the space below and allowed me to put a small litter box on the other side. My cats quite liked it. It seemed stable enough to hold my cat of 16lbs. Only one cat fit in the hammock at a time. It was plush, soft, and washed well! For the price it worked out!
customer_reviews.author: JRTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: It works well but you have to have a place to put it, thats the biggest problem. It works well when I catch stray or feral cats and put them in a cage after they are fixed and either find a new home or barn for them. Easy to wash as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy install
customer_reviews.text: I run a small rescue and TNR cats. For the kittens I trap that are feral the hammocks maximize the cage space while working to tame them.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Gill

customer_reviews.title: I have bought one in the past and it did not hold up but my cat loved it so much I had to use zip ties ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES it! I have bought one in the past and it did not hold up but my cat loved it so much I had to use zip ties because the hooks bent. This one is much nicer as it accommodates her weight and size. The hardware is nice and sturdy and over all I am so much more happier with this product given it is around the same price as the one that did not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kitty Hammock
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this item because it did not work with the outdoor cat enclosure I had but I wish it would've worked out because it was a really pretty and well made hammock. It's on the larger size if anyone is wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Lori MacGregor

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. It's adjustable and has nice strong metal ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. It's adjustable and has nice strong metal click for attaching. Purchased for my rabbit. Unfortunately he won't use it but that's not reflecting on the product. lol.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Durable....
customer_reviews.text: I did my research because the cats at the shelter I volunteer at are big and the cat hammock they had was falling apart. I bought this and they love it and it’s durable and I’m sure will last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Safe and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough for large and playful cats after a different kind broke that had pieces of felt material holding that one up. This one is made extra strong with thick straps like you would find on a backpack. Perfect for large cats or playful kittens. I trust this one with my two male older kittens that are over ten pounds and still growing. I like that the straps are also adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all sorts of pets
customer_reviews.text: Large and durable hammocks. They are reversible- the hard and waterproof side is great if you have animals that pee in their sleep. They have withstood my 20 pound coatimundi jumping on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee F.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my three ferrets and they love them! Hammocks marketed specifically for ferrets tend to be overpriced and crappy quality. I tried these out and instantly loved them. All three pile in it and still have room to move around, it is great quality and durability. Throw it in the washer and I'm good to go! Also, really appreciate the fact that it has a cooling and warmer side for change in seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Cats love hammocks!
customer_reviews.text: Love the reversible sides. We started in the winter with the warm side and flipped it for summer. This is a cat addition to our catio and our cat loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry and Amy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My Cat’s New Favorite !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hammock for my cat to enjoy the outdoors. It is made with good quality materials. Nice color as shown in their ads. I give it a 4 stars because I wish it comes with more color choices. Other than that, it is perfect for my cat. She loves it !
customer_reviews.author: dog lover

customer_reviews.title: Too big for a crate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a large dog crate to keep a litter of 4 foster kittens inside. I thought it would give them an elevated place to sleep. It just didn't fit right inside the crate. I think it's more for outside the crate use such as connecting to a chair of table. It was nicely made so I donated to a local shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice hammock except straps do not last .
customer_reviews.text: After six months the straps began to deteriorate, rendering the hammock useless. One other design suggestion is for outdoor use(we have used ours in an outdoor cat run) the backing fabric is water proof which means if it rains it will hold water, which cats do not appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Besser

customer_reviews.title: Cats not impressed. I am!
customer_reviews.text: My cats are NOT impressed with this hammock. They hate that it moves. It is well-made and if I could sleep in it, I would. Darned cats.
customer_reviews.author: jujulie_1969

customer_reviews.title: Not Just for Cats
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my ferret who is a little "fluffy". She doesn't fit in the normal ferret hammocks but this is a perfect fit for her. It is a little bigger than needed but, at least she has space to stretch.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Strap failure
customer_reviews.text: Straps broke soon after purchase. To bad cat really liked it. Perfect for light kitten not so great for med sized cat. The cat loved it before it failed.
customer_reviews.author: Bay

customer_reviews.title: My two cats love this hammock
customer_reviews.text: This is the same hammock my cats used to sleep in their foster home and they still love it. You can check on YouTube for kitten academy livestream and you will see a camera with kittens sleeping in this hammock 24/7. Great quality and super easy to install
customer_reviews.author: MGerhard

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used this hammock on one of the cat chairs that I painted and decorated. Very nice hammock and it fit quite nicely onto this type of chair.
customer_reviews.author: G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit With My Kitty
customer_reviews.text: I hung it from the ceiling of my kittens big condo-crate , and he loves it. There was a bit of a curve, getting it just right for him. After a few days of experimenting with placement and adjustments. After that, he was in love with his new bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cress

customer_reviews.title: Kitten loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our new kitten while he is crate trained and incorporated into the house with our other 4 cats. He immediately climbed in it and loves it. I didn't quite understand the purpose for the extra loops on the other straps but I put them in the hooks and it helped hold the back straps up higher than the front so I guess that's why they're there.
customer_reviews.author: julesbbsea

customer_reviews.title: Not warm enough for ferrets
customer_reviews.text: Definitely NOT for ferrets. It's just too thin and not the least bit warm for them. Would be OK for kittens, though, I suppose. Returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ferretocious

customer_reviews.title: Cool cat product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my 8 lb. cat but she won’t use it!! Lol! I have it to my sister in law and her cat enjoys it!
customer_reviews.author: blindmongoose

customer_reviews.title: The kitten loved it.
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for a foster kitten to figure it out but once he did he loved it. It's very easy to attach to a kennel and adjust as necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsly

customer_reviews.title: Kitties are Finicky!
customer_reviews.text: To begin with, the kittens used it a bit. As they got older, not so much. It was inexpensive so worth a try. Well made, materials are quality. Why not try it, your cat may just love it! I'm not getting rid of the two I bought, I will put away and they take back out to get them interested again.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My newly adopted kitty LOVES his hammock! It made our 3 week road trip from Montana to Oregon very enjoyable. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Nethercot

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Until our Kitten Casey matures this is her bedroom, and she loves her swing !!
customer_reviews.author: Spang

customer_reviews.title: Looks small, but cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I feel it is a bit small for a full grown cat, but my cat disagrees and uses it each evening.
customer_reviews.author: Taco Mama

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have a sturdy place to attach. Cats like it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been through tons of cat hammocks, our cat absolutely LOVES to sleep on them, however she has gained some weight and finding the right one for her has been hard, TILL I found this one, not only is it very soft, she loves and it holds her well!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Toy Breed Dog Hammock
customer_reviews.text: The hammock is sturdy and well constructed. It works as promised. It's too small in area for my 15lb. Terrier though. It would work perfectly for cats or toy breed dogs under 10 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: debrabrownbear

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than listed and not plush
customer_reviews.text: Nylon on one side and thin fleece on the other. ACTUAL measurements are 21" x 16". Not worth returning but not plush if that is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Janmader

customer_reviews.title: Loved it while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It is super easy to clean and very sturdy. I loved it until my cat decided to chew through the straps and deemed it no longer usable....
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: I want this hammock for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our Ferret and unlike others, he didn’t remove the unnecessary “fluff.” He has plenty of room and we have to wake him now. Maybe I bought the wrong mattress for us? Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Clark

customer_reviews.title: measure first then buy
customer_reviews.text: a little hard to find a place to put this up
customer_reviews.author: michael gregory

customer_reviews.title: Cheap clips
customer_reviews.text: Love the hammock but the clip broke on the one side. Should have better clips. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The kittens loved it. Easy to clip on and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Laubach

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've now purchased three different hammocks in this general price range for my two Chihuahuas. This hammock is by far the highest quality. It is made of far sturdier material than the other two I've tried, and both dogs love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shadowstouch

customer_reviews.title: Cat still hasn't gotten used to this
customer_reviews.text: Tried putting the cat several time. Product well made and strong
customer_reviews.author: Tali

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Hangs without issue and our cat loves it. Seems to be holding up without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Well made, high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I like this alot ! my cat likes it only a little. This doesn't change the fact, however, that is an excellent product and made very well!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two For Kitty Condo
customer_reviews.text: Love! My two, ten-week-old fur babies curl up for naps on these-sometimes together, sometimes separately. Very sturdy and plenty big enough for the kittens well into adulthood.
customer_reviews.author: Cari M. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: My cats are more afraid of it than anything.
customer_reviews.text: Its wierd to hang and my cats want nothing to do with it. It seemed like a good idea, but has failed miserably.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B. Rickey

customer_reviews.title: Clip broke but a good product my cat loved it and still will once I reinforce all clips with zip ties.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first week he used it but then tonight it unexpectedly broke. The clip itself broke and I have no idea how. I will be using zip ties to hold it up because he does like it and I don’t feel I can trust the clips after this.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: kittens love this
customer_reviews.text: my older barn cat didn't have an interest in this but my new barn kittens all love to curl up on this and sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Haight

customer_reviews.title: Best we have tried.
customer_reviews.text: We have very large kittens/cats. This swing is the best we have found. We are well pleased with the product and the price. Will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock
customer_reviews.text: Well made and comfortable. Duke the cat loves this hammock and uses it all the time. Very good price too. We ended up ordering a second one for the new cat.
customer_reviews.author: Al Parra

customer_reviews.title: The new favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this!! It gives him an escape from the kids and the dog but doesn’t take up too much space!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ruffcorn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good concept.... Good quality..... unfortunately the straps are not long enough to wrap around a typical chair frame!
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: The cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the cats cage since we have to lock them up while were at work. They absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kalie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: works for what I needed Update ... did not hold up well outdoors. Maybe 2 months before just falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Christina T

customer_reviews.title: my cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: my cat loves this! I got him in all colors because he likes to play rough and damages it sometimes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little larger than i expected but the kittens like it
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these in black for my raccoon. They're big enough and seem to be really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Candy M. Brotherston

customer_reviews.title: Solid good deal and size
customer_reviews.text: The workmanship is good and it's the largest one at these prices. Will buy more for our rescues.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Momma

customer_reviews.title: Already broken :(
customer_reviews.text: Liked the fabric but already has a broken clasp after one day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My cat likes it! It was easy to hook up.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like everything about it and my cat seems to like it. He lays around in it and he sleeps in it at night. He’s a pretty big cat and he fits in it well.
customer_reviews.author: AmyH

customer_reviews.title: I moved it to a chair and it works perfect. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This did not fit in the table I wanted it to go on. It kept sliding down. I moved it to a chair and it works perfect. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri D. Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loved to spend hours just laying here, sleeping or trying to get some attention.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: The cat thinks this is pretty cool, have it hooked to her outside cage
customer_reviews.text: The cat thinks this is pretty cool, have it hooked to her outside cage. I am concerned the straps may not stay attached, will wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: et

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and nice looking. Cat has yet to use it though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitties like!
customer_reviews.text: The cats at the rescue where I volunteer love these hammocks! They are easy to hang and sturdy. Not bad price either. I’ve bought quite a few of these already.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: We hung it in a large cat cage for a ...
customer_reviews.text: We hung it in a large cat cage for a car ride across the country. One of the hooks snapped in half within the first hour. After replacing it with a makeshift hook, it held steady for the rest of the trip.
customer_reviews.author: BlueRaja

customer_reviews.title: Extension straps NOT included?
customer_reviews.text: I love the hammock but am really disappointed because my package didn't include the extension straps. The details said they're included and showed pictures, which is why I bought this so I'm not super happy that I can't really USE it without them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... cats use it when they please but I am glad they have
customer_reviews.text: My cats use it when they please but I am glad they have it
customer_reviews.author: June Barr

customer_reviews.title: Nice hammock, but cats don't sit in it.
customer_reviews.text: This hammock seems awesome. Good construction, adjustable hanging options.... but I can't get any of my cats to actually sit in it. I've had it for like a month or more, and I try to put them in it, or put their toys in it, put a treat in it, they just don't want to be in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I am (not)

customer_reviews.title: I like it and think it would be great
customer_reviews.text: I like it and think it would be great, but my cat must be too old (15 yrs). He's too nervous to go into it because it moves when he steps into it. It fit great in his play pen/cage.
customer_reviews.author: cobaltcat4

customer_reviews.title: ... well made and my four 12 week old kittens love it! All four fit well in it
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and my four 12 week old kittens love it! All four fit well in it. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: They started out great. I built a PVC frame to hold them
customer_reviews.text: They started out great. I built a PVC frame to hold them. My cats started sleeping in them mid July 2017. In the last month, two of them have broken at the metal clasp. Trying to find out if this company warranties them for a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda S Seyler

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cat hammocks! My cats love them. They are sturdy and well made. I've bought others, and either the clips broke or the straps tore off. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and adjust
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and adjust, I only have one cat that actually uses it, but the others are interested. Glad I got two.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Azevedo

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on some chairs but found one where ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work on some chairs but found one where it does & cats are taking turns using it. Has been a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Deibler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love!! My 2 cats chill all the time in their hammock
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality hammock, with a nice, fuzzy inner lining. One cat hates it, and one cat loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t appeal to my cats
customer_reviews.text: My cats don’t care for it and won’t even try it. Hope it works better with tour cats!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Twain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My cat does use it but it’s what it is
customer_reviews.author: Verified buyer

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves this hammock! Very well made and the color is so pretty
customer_reviews.author: Malii

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the larger clips works with the crate that we are using for the new kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cat love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friends cat, and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for our 2 ferrets!! They got right in it and snuggled up :) Great fabric and made really well!!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Camille Gregory

customer_reviews.title: My cat is not a fan :(
customer_reviews.text: It’s great but my cat will not try it :(
customer_reviews.author: gail pace

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hammock is good quality. Our two cats do not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing wrong with this product but unfortunately my cats aren't interested in it at all. Very well made and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: James Hunter`

product_meta.title: CUSFULL Cat Hammock Bed Comfortable Hanging Pet Hammock Bed for Cats/Small Dogs/Rabbits/Other Small Animals 22 x17 in
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackSpecifications: 55cm * 43cm（22 x17 inches）
Material: Waterproof nylon + super soft velvet
Color: rose red, Blue , black
Features: simple and stylish, for winter and summer, summer with a waterproof nylon surface, winter with soft fabric, long using time and durable!
Application: can be used for cats, small dogs, hamsters, rabbits and so on.
Love pets? Just choose our pet hammock bed for them. You pet will love to sleeping in the comfortable hammock bed.
feature_bullets: Two Sides for Any Season: Soft side for cold weather and waterproof side for hot weather. So comfortable and your pet will want to sleep in it all day!
Convenient Hanging Design: Attach to crate or cage corners with metal hooks, or hang on most chairs using the extra adjustable straps included.
Easy to Clean: Hand wash or in washing machine. (because of the metal hooks, please using a washing bag to protect your washing machine from damage.)
Space Saving: This Hammock bed can be installed under chairs or in cages, it is an ideal product for you to save space. And Cats naturally love to hide in covered spaces.
Best Gift: This pet hammock will be great choice for your pets and your friends who also have cute pets.
